data1 <- c(869, 995, 1056, 1126, 1044, 925, 1172.5, 1408.5, 1028, 1011, 726, 982, 1225, 731, 975.5, 1130.5, 945, 747, 656.5, 919, 751, 774, 941, 751, 767, 813.5, 1289.5, 1096.5, 1083, 1114, 708, 1201)
data2 <- c(860.5, 875, 930.5, 954, 909, 856.5, 896.5, 1311, 887, 863, 674, 894, 1179, 662, 872.5, 811, 909, 752.5, 659.5, 833, 744, 735, 931, 785, 737.5, 750.5, 1140, 1009, 958, 1046, 669, 925)

sd2 <- sd(data2)

var1 <- var(data1)
var2 <- var(data2)

sd1 * sd2 * R1
sqrt(var1) * sqrt(var2) * R1
